description: This easy slow cooker pulled pork takes no effort and is worth waiting for.
name: Slow Cooker Pulled Pork Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush oil all over the pork shoulder and sear on all sides in a pan on medium high heat.
Place the pork shoulder into the slow cooker, pour in the chipotle paste, chicken stock and lime juice and place the garlic cloves into the sauce.

Cook on low for 6-8 hours then remove the pork from the slow cooker and shred with 2 forks. Squish the garlic cloves out of their skin and place the pulled pork and garlic back in the sauce and serve.
